Oct 2016 to date Ecolab India, Middle East & Africa
Ecolab, a Fortune 500 company, is the global leader in water, hygiene and energy technologies and services. Around the world businesses in foodservice, food processing, hospitality, healthcare, industrial, and oil and gas markets choose Ecolab products and services to keep their environment clean and safe, operate efficiently and achieve sustainability goals.

CAREER SUMMARY
Oct 2016 to date Ecolab India, Middle East & Africa
Ecolab, a Fortune 500 company, is the global leader in water, hygiene and energy technologies and services. Around the world businesses in foodservice, food processing, hospitality, healthcare, industrial, and oil and gas markets choose Ecolab products and services to keep their environment clean and safe, operate efficiently and achieve sustainability goals.
Oct 2016 to date
Position: IMEA Talent Acquisition Head
Oversee the Talent Acquisition Center of Excellence (CoE) and the implementation of Talent Acquisition process improvements to hire top talent
Responsible to create and deploy Regional talent acquisition strategies to strengthen the organization's capabilities
Designed and facilitated Behavioral-Based Interview Trainings for managers across MEA
Implemented the Ecolab Employer Brand Promise across the region
Responsible to hire executive roles across Middle East & Africa
Implemented Workday Recruiting Applicant Tracking System across the region
Winner of the Q4 2016 MENA Bravo Excellence Awards for Culture
Nov 2019 to date
Position: IMEA HR Business Partner (dual role)
Provide HR guidance on strategic initiatives for the Energy Downstream business
Execute talent reviews and succession planning
Lead Sales compensation plans and organization structure work aligned to the needs for the global models and expectations
Review employee research and engagement results and conduct action planning
Conduct Workforce Planning and Training Needs Analysis
Advise senior business leaders and managers on serious employee relations issues and manage risk effectively
Establish key communication and change strategies for business events impacting people
HR Development:
Lead the design and implementation of HR Policies across the region
Developed and rolled-out an Onboarding Framework globally
Feb 2017 - Sep 2017
Position: Acting HR Head, Sub-Saharan Africa
HR Operations:
Led all HR functions for Ecolab Sub-Saharan Africa including recruitment, employee relations, compensation, organizational development, talent and change management
Identified and implemented opportunities for improvement in HR service delivery
Managed employee relations and disciplinary hearings activities
Led key compensation and benefits processes including annual merit planning and performance reviews
Received a 2017 Spot Award for the excellent contribution and support provided to the Sub-Saharan Africa HR team
Dec 2010 to Jun 2016 Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi
Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is an initiative of Mubadala, a leading Investment & Development Company in Abu Dhabi, and Cleveland Clinic, one of the top 4 Hospitals in USA. Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi has been considered as the largest and most complex healthcare project in the world and the biggest global recruitment effort in healthcare with hiring occurring in over 65 countries.
Jun 2015 to Jan 2016 Acting Talent Acquisition Director
2014 to Jun 2015 Talent Acquisition Manager
2014 -2014 Talent Acquisition Team Lead
Dec 2010 to Dec 2012 Recruiter
Strategy:
Designed and implemented innovative & integrated talent acquisition strategies and plans
Developed talent acquisition processes & policies
Delivered a strategic framework for sharing and implementing talent acquisition best practices
Created and optimized talent acquisition tools, templates and analytics
Winner of the 2014 Operational Excellence Award from the Mubadala Human Capital Summit
Recruitment:
Led and trained a team of 10 recruitment experts responsible to hire +1,200 roles
Set-up and optimized the talent acquisition function and infrastructure from scratch
Planned & managed the Talent Acquisition & International Mobility budget of AED 11,000,000
Created and rolled-out a digital Talent Attraction Strategy & Candidate Value Proposition
Improved CCAD Employer Brand Index: ranked 26th in the MENA Top 100 Most In-Demand Employers in 2015 by LinkedIn
Reduced

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
